name: S.H.Figuarts KAMEN RIDER BITTER GAVV SPARKINGUMMY FORM
description:
"Sparkingummy! Yummy!"
From the series "Kamen Rider Gavv", Dark Shoma's transformation, Kamen Rider Gavv Sparkingummy Form, now available from S.H.Figuarts!

										The shaping of the body matches, with sharp edges all over. Rider's distinctive body shape and surface patterns are faithfully reproduced as well.
Color gradation on key areas clear parts on the head further add to how accurately it resembles what is seen on the show. The dark coloring that covers the entire body is also expressed in a finishing that aligns with the look of the actual character.
The Bitter Gavv, a mouth on his stomach, features a gimmick that makes its upper jaw open and close, as well as a rotating handle. The Sparkingummy Gochizo set inside can be attached to and removed from the beltas well. The Vrocan Spicy Gochizo on his left hip can be detached from the holder and held in his hands using the included hand parts.
Also included is the Bitter Gavvgablade, the special weapon that Kamen Rider Gavv created himself. The shape of the blade, with all its aggressive intensity, is painstakingly reproduced.
The figure's joint structure preserves the natural lines of the human body, allowing you to position the figure natural-looking poses. This also allows you to make the figure perform the impressive and ferocious actions you see in the show. You can even pull out the shoulder joints to create poses where he holds the Bitter Gavvgablade with both hands.
Display this figure together alongside other S.H. Figuarts Kamen Rider Gavv series figures (sold separately) to greatly expand the world view.
